adxPiano.title: ADX Piano
adxPiano.bio: The first piano to find a home! Not really a public piano, but you can play it when you are at the wonderful ADX facility. 417 SE 11th Ave. Go on in and give it a try! Open during ADX hours.

waterfrontPiano.title: Waterfront Piano
waterfrontPiano.bio: Come beat the Summer heat at the Rose Festival Foundation Patio, right by the Salmon Street Springs fountain on Naito Parkway.

museumPiano.title: Portland Art Museum Piano
museumPiano.bio: We are always proud to place our first public piano with our good friends at the Portland Art Museum. They are available for public players every day during museum hours.

pioneerPiano.title: Pioneer Square Piano
pioneerPiano.bio: Nestled in the little open theater below Starbucks, this location has excellent acoustics and always has a steady stream of visitors, chess players, and musicians. SW Broadway & Morrison. Open Monday - Sunday during daylight hours. (Closed when there are other events going on - check it out to make sure.)

burnsidePiano.title: Burnside Piano
burnsidePiano.bio: Yep, this is the piano in our OPB video. Come play a historical monument! (Just kidding). This is our favorite location, across from Ringler's Annex, just near the bike statue.  Open all hours.

debussy.title: Mount Tabor
debussy.bio: The hills are alive with the sound of music! Come visit Mount Tabor and enjoy some tunes while there. Open during park hours.

chopin.title: Cathedral Park
chopin.bio: Live in a van down by the river! Open during park hours.
